content.description: All holds are good with balance driven beta to get under the prow and over.
content.location: Once again looking straight on at the prow it is a low sit start on the left arete. Follow this up and over the prow to good holds.

content.description: This is an interested climb with sharp holds. Just hang on!
content.protection: A couple of pads should be fine.
content.location: While looking at the prow once again this starts on the right side of the boulder in the small void area. Small flakes to start and a big move after, once again finish up the face of the prow with good holds.

content.description: Good balance climb with interesting beta to stop a barndoor. The only reason why I give this a V0-V1 is because of a specific piece of beta that makes with climb somewhat hard.
content.protection: A couple of pads will be fine.
content.location: While looking at the prow straight on it will be all the way to the left on the obvious slab with a low sit start toward the back of the boulder. Work your way across the face and up the prow to finish to good holds.

content.description: Found this boulder while visiting Boundary Pond. Couple of small lines on it nothing crazy. Not worth going to unless you are up in the area. I just wanted to add it because the lines are great and the rock quality is awesome.
